title: Brutus' Death
body:
Brutus' Death

Just as Brutus lifted his sword to cut off Valery's arm, a small dark sun appeared a few meters above the frozen ground and a large area was engulfed in darkness.

When darkness suddenly engulfed the area, Brutus' expression changed and he quickly created a metal shield behind him.

Bang!

The metal shield Brutus created shattered with a loud bang and a small black claw struck him right at his back.

Cough *

Brutus coughed out blood because of the impact and was sent flying away.

When Valery heard the sound of the loud bang she quickly opened her eyes, but all she saw around her was darkness.

"What the hell is happening now?" Valery muttered in a dazed voice while looking around in the darkness. The darkness was very thick and she could see only a few meters in front of her.

Swish!

Brutus who just crashed to the ground heard the sound of wind slicing and all hairs on his body stood up.
